channel.title: 新闻 on BloxTop
channel.description: Recent content in 新闻 on BloxTop

item.title: BCH bounce
item.description: BCH bounce There is a 30% dip since 2020-2-14 and short-term bottom pattern may form soon. A bounce is expected. Celo token sale Celo is an open-source platform planning to issue a utility digital token Celo Gold and a stablecoin Celo Dollar. Celo will have a public sale on CoinList. According to a CoinList customer, auction is already open. Celo has already raised a total of $36.5M in funding over 2 rounds with participation of Polychain Capital and Andreessen Horowitz among others.

item.title: Halving year
item.description: Halving year Halving is a process of reducing the rate sending to miners when cryptocurrency is generated. There are some large Capitalization coins halving this year and they show great influence on cryptocurrency marcket. Here are some halvings you should know: Is the end of BTC bullish? BTC pullback came as expected and 10% dropped since 2020/2/13. Alts are slumping during the period. I can’t help to ask that does the BTC bullish end?

item.title: BTC long trade 2
item.description: BTC long trade 2 Previously on BTC long trade: It has broken the resistance strongly. Long opportunity may continue after a pullback in near future. It seems have gone the way as we expected. It raised to 9553 on 2020/01/31 and pullback to 9088 on 2020/02/05, then raised again(long opportunity). Next step Now BTC is testing 9552, another wave is around the corner if it doesn’t break the support. I’m still bullish about future.

item.title: SERO wait and long trade
item.description: SERO wait and long SERO has broken the resistance 0.08. Long oppornity exists after a pullback. Let’s wait and long. News and Events Origo will burn 15% of total OGO supply. According to the recent blog post Origo has just burned 5% of total supply and will burn eventually another 10% during unspecified period of time. The tokens will come from from the Ecosystem Reserve (90M OGO) and from the Foundation Reserve (60M OGO).

item.title: BTC long trade
item.description: BTC long trade It has broken the resistance strongly. Long opportunity may continue after a pullback in near future. News and Events Top 5 most discussed new coins in Twitter year to date: BTT, BOLT, MATIC, ATOM, WIN. Top 5 most mentioned exchanges in Twitter year to date: Binance, Kucoin, Coinbase, Bitmex, Poloniex. Token sale detail of WazirX launches on Binance Lauchpad. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
